description: Simple and to the point, exactly what I need on a note taking software

This app is beatiful and simple and let's you focus on the notes themselves. It uses markdown and syncs with Nextcloud, which is all that I needed. Could use some extra work on smoothening the user experience and UI flow.
summary: A simple note app with Nextcloud sync

description: Beautiful design, syncs with Nextcloud, simple. All you could ask for, right? Well... not quite. It's really annoying to type markdown to make simple formatting changes. I would strongly prefer some semblance of inline WYSIWYG editing, similar to Google Keep, Microsoft OneNote, even the official mobile Nextcloud Notes apps, and basically every other popular note-taking app. But it's fine for now, and there's no alternatives, so I'll take it.

Sync works reliable and fast.
The only issue I have is that the rendering doesn't seem to work.
Thanks for a simple but awesome app.

Perfect for jotting quick notes, but flexible enough to help organize and search. Syncs incredibly well (feels very reliable), and doesn't hog system resources. No lag. Great app icon+UI. I absolutely recommend Iotas! If you have a performant NC server and internet connection, Iotas will put them to use by syncing at lightning speeds.

Great app: very well designed UI. I use to synch with my Nextcloud. 0 technical faults, works great.
Great work on developing this app !

l'application fonctionne bien, elle a toutes les fonctionnalités que on pourrait attendre d'un éditeur Markdown/prise de notes. 
Je regrette néanmoins que il n'y ait pas certaines fonctionnalités obscures de markdown comme les notes de bas de page, mais la plupart du temps c'est amplement suffisant (du moins suffisant pour prendre notes durant les cours ou faire des résumés élégants 😉️)
Si vous voulez un éditeur plus complet, je conseille Apostrphe, mais l'organisation que Iotas permet m'a fait pencher pour ça.

Очень классное приложение. Очень важные моменты:
1. Синхронизация
2. Поддержка Markdown.
3. Красивый дизайн.
4. Легкое приложение.
Очень нравится приложение. Спасибо разработчикам!
